title: React Native Mobile App
prompt:
Create a React Native app for [DESCRIPTION]:

Requirements:
1. Platform: iOS/Android/Both
2. Navigation and state management
3. Features: [LIST FEATURES]
4. Native features (camera, geolocation, notifications)
5. Performance optimization
6. Offline support
7. Testing (unit, E2E with Detox)
8. Deployment configuration

Use TypeScript and provide complete project structure.
example: Create fitness tracking app with workout logging
